member.name: T:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchClient
member.summary: Google search engine.

member.name: M:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchClient.Search(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The API provides 100 search queries per day for free. If you need more, you may sign up for billing in the console.
member.param: This is the value from GoogleSearchApi.Queries.NextPage/PreviousPage[0].startIndex used for paging. Default is 1
The search engine to use in your request (using either the cx or cref query parameters). By default it uses cxKey.
member.returns: Returns a GoogleSearch class which you can pass into the view.

member.name: T:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel
member.summary: //This is a Model that will hold search results.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.kind
member.summary: Unique identifier for the type of current object. For this API, it is customsearch#search.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.url
member.summary: The OpenSearch URL element that defines the template for this API.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.queries
member.summary: Contains one or more sets of query metadata, keyed by role name. The possible role names are defined by the OpenSearch query roles and by two custom roles: "nextPage" and "previousPage".

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.context
member.summary: Metadata about the particular search engine that was used for performing the search query.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.items
member.summary: The current set of custom search results.

member.name: T:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Url
member.summary: The OpenSearch URL element that defines the template for this API.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Url.type
member.summary: The MIME type of the OpenSearch Url template for the Custom Search API.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Url.template
member.summary: The actual OpenSearch template for this API.

member.name: T:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet
member.summary: Contains one or more sets of query metadata, keyed by role name. The possible role names are defined by the OpenSearch query roles and by two custom roles: "nextPage" and "previousPage".

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.title
member.summary: A description of the query.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.totalResults
member.summary: Number of total search results.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.searchTerms
member.summary: The search terms entered by the user.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.count
member.summary: Number of search results returned in this set.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.startIndex
member.summary: The index of the current set of search results into the total set of results, where the index of the first result is 1.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.startPage
member.summary: The page number of this set of results, where the page length is set by the count property.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.language
member.summary: The language of the search results.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.inputEncoding
member.summary: The character encoding supported for search requests.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.outputEncoding
member.summary: The character encoding of the search results.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.safe
member.summary: The safe search level used for filtering results. This is a custom property not defined in the OpenSearch spec.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.cx
member.summary: The identifier of a custom search engine created by visiting http://www.google.com/cse, if specified in request. This is a custom property not defined in the OpenSearch spec.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.QuerieSet.cref
member.summary: A URL pointing to the definition of a linked custom search engine, if specified in request. This is a custom property not defined in the OpenSearch spec.

member.name: T:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Queries
member.summary: Contains one or more sets of query metadata, keyed by role name. The possible role names are defined by the OpenSearch query roles and by two custom roles: "nextPage" and "previousPage".

member.name: T:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Context
member.summary: Metadata about the particular search engine that was used for performing the search query.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Context.title
member.summary: The name of the search engine that was used for the query.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.kind
member.summary: A unique identifier for the type of current object. For this API, it is customsearch#result.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.title
member.summary: The title of the search result, in plain text.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.htmlTitle
member.summary: The title of the search result, in HTML.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.link
member.summary: The full URL to which the search result is pointing, e.g. http://www.example.com/foo/bar.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.displayLink
member.summary: An abridged version of this search resultâ€™s URL, e.g. www.example.com.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.snippet
member.summary: The snippet of the search result, in plain text.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.htmlSnippet
member.summary: The snippet of the search result, in HTML.

member.name: P:GoogleSearchApi.GoogleSearchModel.Item.pagemap
member.summary: Contains pagemap information for this search result.
